description.p: Areas of work included data analysis, developing engineering software, and drilling dynamics.\nolinebreak[4]

bulletedlist.item: Developed a software application that automates the cleaning and processing of data.
Technologies used: C#, C++, C, .Net Framework, XML, XSLT, HTML, Javascript
Developed plotting software which can be easily configured for a variety of data sources.
Technologies used: C#, .Net Framework, XML, XSLT, HTML, Javascript
